SEARCH
Package data_managers

Class AdminManager

java.lang.Object
data_managers.AdminManager
public class AdminManager extends Object
The AdminManager class takes care of interacting with the file where the admin accounts are stored. It performs writing, reading and searching in the admins' storage.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    ADMINS_PATH
    The ADMINS_PATH constant points to the file where admins are stored.

      The ADMINS_PATH constant points to the file where admins are stored.

  • Method Details

    • readAdmins

      public static ArrayList<Admin> readAdmins()
      The readAdmins function reads all admin records from the admins' storage.
      Returns:
      An array list of the admin records from the storage. Empty array list if not any.

    • ifAdminExists

      public static boolean ifAdminExists(Admin admin)
      The ifAdminExists function checks if an admin record exists in the admins' storage.
      Parameters:
      admin - The admin record to be checked for existence in the storage.
      Returns:
      true if the admin exists in the storage. false if not.

    • writeAdmin

      public static void writeAdmin(Admin admin)
      The writeAdmin function adds an admin record to the admins' storage.
      Parameters:
      admin - The admin record to be written in the storage.

    • checkCredentials

      public static Admin checkCredentials(String username, String password)
      The checkCredentials function checks if there exists an admin account with the given username/email and password.
      Parameters:
      username - Either the username or the email with which the admin tries to log in.
      password - The password of the admin trying to log in.
      Returns:
      The admin record if there exists one with the corresponding email and password. null if it doesn't exist.
